message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering its value to you is $10000. I'm confident you'll love it!
I appreciate the enthusiasm, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm still very interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

I understand your concerns about budget, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $10500. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you. I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that. I'm willing to go up to $9500. I really think that's a fair price for the product.

I understand you're getting close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $10200. This is as low as I can go while still ensuring I get a fair price for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above your latest offer. I'm willing to go up to $9800. I really think that's a fair price for the product.

I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $10100. This is my final offer. I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above your latest offer. I'm willing to go up to $9500, but I'm not going any higher. I'm really hoping we can meet in the middle.
I understand you're willing to go up to $9500, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $9750. This is my final offer. I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above your latest offer. I'm willing to go up to $9500, but I'm not going any higher. I'm really hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
